org.perfidix.socketadapter

Interface IUpdater

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SocketViewProgressUpdater

    public interface IUpdater
    This class creates the connection to the eclipse view via SocketViewStub. It contains the methods which update the view to inform about the bench process progress.
    Author:
    Nuray Guerler, University of Konstanz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finished()
      This method notifies the view that all benches have been executed and the bench progress is finished.
      boolean initProgressView(Map<BenchmarkMethod,Integer> mapping)
      This method initializes the values of the eclipse view and resets the progress bar.
      boolean updateCurrentElement(AbstractMeter meter, String name)
      This method notifies the eclipse view which element is currently benched.
      boolean updateErrorInElement(String name, Exception exception)
      This method informs the view that an error occurred while benching the current element.

    • Method Detail

      • initProgressView

        boolean initProgressView(Map<BenchmarkMethod,Integer> mapping)
                         throws SocketViewException
        This method initializes the values of the eclipse view and resets the progress bar.
        Parameters:
        mapping - a mapping with all methods to benchmark and the related runs
        Throws:
        SocketViewException

      • updateCurrentElement

        boolean updateCurrentElement(AbstractMeter meter,
                           String name)
                             throws SocketViewException
        This method notifies the eclipse view which element is currently benched.
        Parameters:
        meter - The current meter.
        name - This param represents the java element which is currently benched and which is fully qualified.
        Throws:
        SocketViewException

      • updateErrorInElement

        boolean updateErrorInElement(String name,
                           Exception exception)
                             throws SocketViewException
        This method informs the view that an error occurred while benching the current element.
        Parameters:
        name - Element represents the java element which has not been executed successfully.
        exception - The exception caused by the element.
        Throws:
        SocketViewException

      • finished

        void finished()
              throws SocketViewException
        This method notifies the view that all benches have been executed and the bench progress is finished.
        Throws:
        SocketViewException
